alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 2:08AM PST until November 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...MAJOR WINTER STORM STARTING TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND CONTINUING THROUGH WEDNESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Above 4000 feet, snow accumulations between 1 to 2 feet. Below 4000, total snow accumulations 10 to 16 inches. In the mountains the winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Leavenworth, Twisp, Loup Loup Pass, Stevens Pass, Blewett Pass, Methow, Conconully, Holden Village, Stehekin, Winthrop, Plain, and Mazama. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility in the mountains. Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes will be impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
